net.uniform.impl

Class ElementWithOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.uniform.impl.AbstractElement
      • net.uniform.impl.AbstractHTMLElement
        • net.uniform.impl.ElementWithOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultioptionInputElement, Multiselect, Select

    public abstract class ElementWithOptions
extends AbstractHTMLElement
    Abstract element implementation that contains all generic logic that any element with options should have.
    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos

      • addOptionToGroup

        public ElementWithOptions addOptionToGroup(Option option,
                                           String groupId)
        Adds an option to the group of this element with the given id. If the group is not found, it's created with null text.
        Parameters:
        option - New option with unique value in this element
        groupId - Id of the option group
        Returns:
        This element

      • addOptionToGroup

      • getOptions

        public List<Option> getOptions(boolean includeDisabled)
        Returns all the options in this element, in list order.
        Parameters:
        includeDisabled - Indicates if disabled options should be included in the list. If a group itself is disabled, its options are also considered as disabled.
        Returns:
        List of options

      • getOptions

        public List<Option> getOptions()
        Returns all the options in this element, in list order.
        Returns:
        List of options

      • getEnabledOptions

        public List<Option> getEnabledOptions()
        Returns all the options in this element that are not disabled, in list order. If a group itself is disabled, its options are also considered as disabled.
        Returns:
        List of options

      • getOptionsValues

        public Set<String> getOptionsValues()
        Returns all the values of the options of this element.
        Returns:
        Set of values

      • getEnabledOptionValues

        public Set<String> getEnabledOptionValues()
        Returns all the values of the options of this element that are enabled. If a group itself is disabled, its options are also considered as disabled.
        Returns:
        Set of values of enabled options

      • getOptionGroups

        public List<OptionGroup> getOptionGroups()
        Returns all option groups in this element
        Returns:
        List of option groups, never null

      • clearOptions

        public ElementWithOptions clearOptions()
        Removes all options and option groups of this element.
        Returns:
        This element

      • setOptions

        public ElementWithOptions setOptions(LinkedHashMap<String,String> options)
        Replaces all options of this element.
        Parameters:
        options - Options to use. LinkedHashMap to keep options original ordering.
        Returns:
        This element

      • hasValue

        public boolean hasValue(String value)
        Indicates if the element has a value in any of its groups.
        Parameters:
        value - Value
        Returns:
        True if the value exists, false otherwise

      • hasValueEnabled

        public boolean hasValueEnabled(String value)
        Indicates if the element has an enabled value in any of its groups, that must also be enabled.
        Parameters:
        value - Value
        Returns:
        True if the value exists and is enabled, false otherwise
